constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHIFF:
H.R. 838.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to Article I, Section 8 of
the United States Constitution.
[Page H388]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Supporting Children with Disabilities During COVID–19 Act
